There is a boy in the kitchen.
There are girls in the living room.
There are small animals in the yard.
They are so smart and cute.
What, what, what, what are in the country?
There are many, many places in the country.
Field, field, field, there is a field in the country.
Barn, barn, barn, there is a barn in the country.
Shed, shed, shed, there is a shed in the country.
Pen, pen, pen, there is a pen in the country.
What, what, what, what else is in the country?
Corral, garden, farmhouse, I can't name them all.
